title: Why is kayn such a stupid champ
body: OK. Whenever i go against a kayn in the jg THEY DO TERRIBLE. They feed the first few kills. Can't farm and do nothing. Then they get their change form and can one shot me when they are a mile behind. WTF IS THAT. They feed and it doesn't even matter. It happens whenever i go against a kayn

replies.body:
Oh so a terrible Kayn can get insane despite lack of skill once they have items? 
Just like a terrible Yas or a terrible Yi?

LoL is balanced.
